p: Following the formalin injection, rats were immediately returned to the observation chamber. The time spent on licking and biting of the injected paw was determined as nociceptive behavior. The formalin-induced behavioral responses were biphasic, as follows: 0–5 minutes (first phase, neurogenic phase) and 15–45 minutes (second phase, inflammatory phase) ( Tamaddonfard & Hamzeh-Gooshchi, 2010).
